Calculation guidance
AR 32. When preparing the information on energy consumption required under paragraph 35, the
undertaking shall:
(a) only report energy consumed from processes owned or controlled by the undertaking
applying the same perimeter applied for reporting GHG Scopes 1 and 2 emissions;
(b) exclude feedstocks and fuels that are not combusted for energy purposes. The
undertaking that consumes fuel as feedstocks can disclose information on this
